pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 7 (64 bit) or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 256MB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any and plug in speakers
  • Additional Notes: Resolutions with Medium Detail ( 640x360 with 256MB GPU ) ( 960x540 with 512MB GPU ) ( 1280x720 with 1GB GPU ) ( 1920x1080 with 2GB GPU ) ( 3840x2160 with 4GB GPU ) ( 7680x4320 with 8GB GPU )
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10 (64 bit) or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 2GB or more
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any and plug in speakers
